content:
TITLE: Cloning the MRTK Repository
DESCRIPTION: Command for cloning the main branch of the Mixed Reality Toolkit repository, using a placeholder for the user's git URL.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mixedrealitytoolkit/mixedrealitytoolkit-projectdocs/blob/main/contributions/code-contributions.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone --branch main YOUR_GIT_URL
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Feature Branch
DESCRIPTION: Command for creating a new git branch to implement fixes or features for the MRTK project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mixedrealitytoolkit/mixedrealitytoolkit-projectdocs/blob/main/contributions/code-contributions.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git checkout -b foobar_fix
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Git Tag Format Example for Package Releases
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the required format for git tags when releasing packages, using the pattern [package-postfix]-vMAJOR.MINOR.PATCH.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mixedrealitytoolkit/mixedrealitytoolkit-projectdocs/blob/main/contributions/versioning-and-releases.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
core-v3.0.1 or input-v3.2.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Playmode Tests in Batch Mode
DESCRIPTION: PowerShell command for running Unity playmode tests in batch mode without opening the Unity editor, generating output files in the /out folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mixedrealitytoolkit/mixedrealitytoolkit-projectdocs/blob/main/contributions/code-contributions.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: powershell
CODE:
```
./Tooling/Tests/run_playmode_tests.ps1
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Playmode Tests with Custom Parameters
DESCRIPTION: PowerShell command for running Unity playmode tests with specified Unity version and project path parameters, allowing for more targeted testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mixedrealitytoolkit/mixedrealitytoolkit-projectdocs/blob/main/contributions/code-contributions.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: powershell
CODE:
```
./Tooling/Tests/run_playmode_tests.ps1 -unityVersion 2021.3.5f1 -projectPath ../my/project/path
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Unity Menu Path for MRTK About Dialog
DESCRIPTION: Shows the Unity menu navigation path to access the MRTK version information dialog.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mixedrealitytoolkit/mixedrealitytoolkit-projectdocs/blob/main/contributions/versioning-and-releases.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
Mixed Reality > MRTK3 > About MRTK
```
